subject: Talking to the dead book
author: Urkel23
full_text:
This book is such a great read, people should check it out.  Did you know that radio sweep is nothing new?  Many researchers have been using it for years.  Franz Seidel used it in the 1950's.  

I guess that's where frank got the idea, just duplicate what has worked since the 50's.  I thought frank came up with the idea of radio sweep, this book is full of stuff i never knew.  People should pick it up and read it, i got through 165 pages in just a few days.

-Steve H.
